channel.title: CVE Feed for The Tor Project -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The Tor Project -- all products

item.title: CVE-2015-2929|2024-08-06T05:32:20.617Z -- the%20tor%20project -- tor
item.description: The Hidden Service (HS) client implementation in Tor before 0.2.4.27, 0.2.5.x before 0.2.5.12, and 0.2.6.x before 0.2.6.7 allows remote servers to cause a denial of service (assertion failure and application exit) via a malformed HS descriptor.

item.title: CVE-2015-2688|2024-08-06T05:24:38.426Z -- the%20tor%20project -- tor
item.description: buf_pullup in Tor before 0.2.4.26 and 0.2.5.x before 0.2.5.11 does not properly handle unexpected arrival times of buffers with invalid layouts, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (assertion failure and daemon exit) via crafted packets.

item.title: CVE-2015-2928|2024-08-06T05:32:20.595Z -- the%20tor%20project -- tor
item.description: The Hidden Service (HS) server implementation in Tor before 0.2.4.27, 0.2.5.x before 0.2.5.12, and 0.2.6.x before 0.2.6.7 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (assertion failure and daemon exit) via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2015-2689|2024-08-06T05:24:37.938Z -- the%20tor%20project -- tor
item.description: Tor before 0.2.4.26 and 0.2.5.x before 0.2.5.11 does not properly handle pending-connection resolve states during periods of high DNS load, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (assertion failure and daemon exit) via crafted packets.
